{"id":375431284,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1596464749,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/375431284/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        int L = 0; \n        int R = s.length() - 1; \n        \n        while(L < R) {\n            if (!isalnum(s[L])) {\n                ++L; \n            } else if (!isalnum(s[R])) {\n                --R; \n            } else if (tolower(s[L]) != tolower(s[R])) {\n                return false; \n            } else {\n                ++L;\n                --R; \n            }\n        }\n        return true; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
